job description:
LockerDomes native ad platform optimizes ROI in real time. Learn more at lockerdome.com.

As a Junior Data Analyst on the Data & Analytics team, you will serve as the primary decision maker for advertiser and publisher accounts. Leveraging LockerDome's homegrown analytics tooling and optimization techniques, you will make daily optimizations to ensure we beat client expectations.

Your skills should include:
  • Degree in a business, scientific or quantitative field
  • Strong statistical intuition and command of relevant analytical approaches
  • Ability to explain your findings in a concise, actionable manner
  • Ability to learn new skills and information sets quickly
  • Working knowledge of performance-based and direct response marketing is is preferred
  • Working knowledge of the native advertising and content marketing landscape is preferred
  • Working knowledge of the digital media landscape is preferred
